text: Bachir Mahamat (born 1 December 1996) is a Chadian sprinter. He competed in the men's 400 metres at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2016 |Olympic Games |Rio de Janeiro, Brazil |48th (h) |400 m |48.59 |- |rowspan=2|2017 |Islamic Solidarity Games |Baku, Azerbaijan |11th (h) |400 m |48.23 |- |World Championships |London, United Kingdom |47th (h) |400 m |47.50 |- |2019 |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |36th (h) |400 m |47.65 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * *Bachir Mahamat at All-Athletics.com Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Chadian male sprinters Category:Olympic athletes of Chad Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:World Athletics Championships athletes for Chad
title: Bachir Mahamat
